[ar:Chloe x Halle]
[al:Do It]

[00:00.00]Do It - Chloe x Halle
[00:03.52]Lyrics by：Chloe Bailey/Scott Storch/Halle Bailey/Victoria Monét/Vincent van den Ende/Anton Kuhl
[00:07.04]Composed by：Chloe Bailey/Scott Storch/Halle Bailey/Victoria Monét/Vincent van den Ende/Anton Kuhl
[00:10.56]Yeah I beat my face
[00:12.76]Moving fast cause the Uber on the way
[00:15.61]Taking pictures make sure you can't see no lace
[00:18.44]That wig secure like the money in the safe
[00:21.20]I look like bae
[00:22.39]Now I'm on my way
[00:24.25]Let you know when I'm 'bout a mile away
[00:27.15]When I'm outside please don't make me wait
[00:29.88]The party starting when we pull up to the gate we so late
[00:33.96]I'm just with the crew
[00:35.88]We ain't out here looking for boo
[00:38.75]'Cause some nights be better with you
[00:43.04]It's a homies only kind of mood
[00:46.11]And tonight we on a hundred
[00:51.51]One hundred
[00:54.71]No drama
[00:55.50]No baby mamas
[00:57.07]Keeping it cute
[00:58.19]Oh oh oh
[00:59.70]That's just what I do do do
[01:02.50]And that's just how we do it do it do it
[01:05.25]Yeah that's just how we do it do it do it
[01:08.10]You liking what I do do you
[01:11.24]Know how to keep it cool
[01:13.95]And that's just how we do it
[01:15.47]Yeah that's just how we do it
[01:16.81]And you could do it too too too oh
[01:20.55]No complaints
[01:22.03]Left the heels at home I'm on my sneaker game
[01:24.90]He say where you from
[01:26.08]Tell 'em outer space
[01:27.90]'Cause a bag the only thing I'm tryna chase
[01:30.60]I'm M.I.A
[01:32.02]Just tell the DJ
[01:32.96]Press play rewind
[01:34.33]Keep it on repeat
[01:35.75]Tiptoe round a hater I'm light on my feet
[01:38.58]That's how you do it
[01:39.37]Keep stunting on your enemies
[01:41.58]Good vibes only
[01:43.31]I'm just with the crew
[01:45.35]We ain't looking for a boo
[01:48.11]'Cause some nights be better with you
[01:52.25]It's a homies only kind of mood
[01:55.32]And tonight we on a hundred
[02:00.91]One hundred
[02:04.08]No drama

[02:06.48]Keeping it cute
[02:07.63]Oh oh oh

[02:11.89]And that's just how we do it do it do it
[02:14.64]Yeah that's just how we do it do it do it
[02:17.54]You liking what I do do you
[02:20.38]Know how to keep it cool
[02:23.28]And that's just how we do it
[02:24.81]Yeah that's just how we do it

data.trans:
[ti:Do It]
[ar:Chloe x Halle]
[al:Do It]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:03.52]//
[00:07.04]//
[00:10.56]我精心打扮
[00:12.76]飞速前进 因为车子快要到了
[00:15.61]拍几张照片 确保我完美无瑕地出现在你面前
[00:18.44]戴上假发 就像保险柜里塞满钞票一样让我感到安心
[00:21.20]我看上去好极了
[00:22.39]此刻我正在路上
[00:24.25]当我快要到的时候 我会提前告诉你
[00:27.15]当我在门口的时候 请别让我等待
[00:29.88]当我们驶出大门的时候 舞会已拉开序幕 我们姗姗来迟
[00:33.96]我只是和朋友在一起
[00:35.88]我们并非前来寻欢作乐
[00:38.75]因为有你在的夜晚会更美好
[00:43.04]好友欢聚一堂的愉悦心情
[00:46.11]今晚我们拿出一百分的热情
[00:51.51]热情洋溢
[00:54.71]不会瞎胡闹
[00:55.50]亲爱的女孩
[00:57.07]镇定自若
[00:58.19]//
[00:59.70]这就是我所做的一切
[01:02.50]我们也可以随心所欲
[01:05.25]我们也可以随心所欲
[01:08.10]你对我所做的一切感到心满意足
[01:11.24]你知道保持洒脱自在的诀窍
[01:13.95]我们也可以随心所欲
[01:15.47]我们也可以随心所欲
[01:16.81]你也可以亲身体会
[01:20.55]别怨声载道
[01:22.03]我把高跟鞋脱在家里 我穿上运动鞋
[01:24.90]他说 你来自哪里
[01:26.08]告诉他们 我来自外太空
[01:27.90]因为我一心想着挣钱
[01:30.60]我是M.I.A
[01:32.02]请告DJ
[01:32.96]按下重播键
[01:34.33]重复播放这首歌
[01:35.75]避开那些讨厌你的人 我步履轻盈
[01:38.58]你可以随心所欲
[01:39.37]在你的死对头面前尽情炫耀
[01:41.58]只有轻松愉悦的心情
[01:43.31]我只是和朋友在一起
[01:45.35]我们并非前来寻欢作乐
[01:48.11]因为有你在的夜晚会更美好
[01:52.25]好友欢聚一堂的愉悦心情
